about_the_game:
Play as a young socially-anxious necromancer as they develop a thriving garden on the balcony they inherited from their deceased grandmother. 

She was a green witch with a renowned garden, but you don’t have the same green thumb. You took up the necromantic arts instead — which makes a grim situation a little more hopeful when your grandmother’s plants all die! Use your magic to raise undead plants and tend their spectral flowers.

Learn spells, resurrect plants, and attract ghostly bees to generate mystical honey. Then take your goods to the local market and make friends with your co-op building community — all while balancing your social battery.

Greenheart Necromancer takes elements of farming and simulation games but weaves them into a calming, vibey idle game you can leave running while you work or study. Unlike many idle games, it doesn’t try to get you stuck in a loop of predatory microtransactions and stress. Attend to your garden occasionally for a break, engage with the narrative on your own schedule, and use quirky magic that rewards success and failure alike!

  • Care for your garden — living and undead plants alike! — and make a vibrant balcony your own

  • Cast powerful spells to bring dead plants back to (un)life, encourage growth, protect against pests, and even alter a plant’s preferences — the ultimate gardener’s power fantasy

  • Grow your plants’ levels to unlock special traits and increase their yields through a cycle of life and undeath and resurrection

  • Reframe failure — a plant’s shrivelled death is just the next part of its journey

  • Play alongside your regular day with idle gameplay that rewards you for stepping away

  • Vibe to the chill beats or simply enjoy the ambience of your garden as the wind dances through the leaves

Greenheart Necromancer is currently in production, and more information will be coming soon! Wishlist, follow, and check out our socials so you don’t miss what’s next.

name: Greenheart Necromancer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12, or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Raise a garden — from the dead! Greenheart Necromancer is a cozy, witchy, semi-idle game about caring for a balcony garden — living and undead plants alike! Grow cute plants, cast spells, and brew potions, enjoying the chill idle gameplay and balcony ambience throughout your day.
